Name: Tolojanahary
description:
His name is Tolojanahary. He is 27 years old, he is married and has one child. He is an active and responsible family man, despite his young age.
He and his family live in a rural area. He is a farmer and raises livestock and he is also a canvasser of zebus.

The family has a big project, to build their own house.
Tolojanahary will begin to gradually develop his activities to increase their income and invest savings for this great project.
He needs capital and will resort to loans.

This first loan will help him grow rainfed rice.
He needs 20 kg of seeds, five carts of manure and 30 kg of chemical fertilizers. He will provide the rest of the necessary inputs. He will sell the harvest and invest the earnings in savings.
